General.Name: Xponential Fitness Inc
General.Description: Xponential Fitness, Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates as a boutique fitness franchisor in North America. It offers pilates, indoor cycling, barre, stretching, rowing, dancing, boxing, running, functional training, and yoga services under the Club Pilates, Pure Barre, CycleBar, StretchLab, Row House, YogaSix, Rumble, AKT, Stride, and BFT brands. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Irvine, California.
General.Address: 17877 Von Karman Avenue, Irvine, CA, United States, 92614
